Title: Prohibits the sale or lease of certain types of real property in the state to foreign countries of concern and foreign principals
Summary: Prohibits the sale or lease of agricultural and forest property and real property on or within ten miles of any military installation or critical infrastructure facility in the state to foreign countries of concern and foreign principals.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting the sale or lease of certain types of real property in the state to foreign countries of concern and foreign principals
